name: Should Have Pulled Out
description:
This game was made for "Det Grønne Jam" (the green jam) in less that 48 hours by 5 students.

Chase around your electricity-wasting kid to keep the bills down! 

The game features thrilling 2p online mulitplayer, where player 1 will play as the parent, endlessly trying to stop their child from wasting water and electricity, while player 2 plays as said child.

Be ready for anything!
You never know when you might be interrupted by cumbersome tasks that demand your focus!

This was our first 3D game, and multiplayer game. So it isn't finished and have some bugs.
